item.title: Firefox Add-On Develop
item.description: Multi Profile （多个火狐） Windows Create Profiles "C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" --Profilemanager Create shortcut for specific profile “direct” (ex.) "C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" -P direct --no-remote My firefox plugins %caption: 常用插件 Develop Extension / Addons 开发文档
